titles.title: Intellectual Property Technical Amendments Act of 2000
For the relief of Anne M. Nagel.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 3/8/2000--Introduced. Waives a specified time limitation under the Public Health Service Act with respect to a petition for compensation filed by a named individual for vaccine-related injuries.
